segments.text: I wonder if you could help me , I'm looking for a room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I have got a vacancy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What sort of price are you asking ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Eight dolls fifty a week excluding laundry .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would it be convenient to see the room ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can you call back later ? We're right in the middle of lunch .
segments.speaker: S2
